recipe.title: Kir Vodka Martini
ingredients: 2 teaspoons crème de cassis (black currant-flavored liqueur)
instructions: Fill cocktail shaker with ice. Add vodka; shake to chill thoroughly. Divide vodka between 2 large cocktail (Martini) glasses. Carefully drop 1 teaspoon cr&egaveme de cassis into each glass (liqueur will sink to bottom). Garnish each Martini with 1 lemon twist.
